description:
.NET Utilities unifies solutions to tasks which are unnecessarily complex / complicated, by exposing simple and effective methods which are to the point. For instance, to request a web page, this is all the code you would need:

string html = Http.Get("http://google.com");

.NET Utilities can help you keep your code cleaner and shorter by providing you with the following tools:
- SHA1, SHA256, SHA384 & SHA512 hashing functions.
- Random string generation.
- Web Requests (GET, POST & Download).
- Mail functions (SMTP).

You can find the documentation, code examples & source codes all on GitHub:

https://github.com/AydinAdn/NetUtilities
releaseNotes:
Added new methods to the Http class to allow clients to download files and updated the SMTP class due to bugs. 

Also created a Test project which you can find on GitHub.
summary: .NET Utilities: Achieve more with less, from Http requests to hashing algorithms. A single line of code can achieve it all (well... almost).
title: .NET Utilities
